name: VESP Eco Flame
description:
INTRODUCING THE NEW VESP!

This chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of reflective material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A versatile cut looks great over anything from a T-shirt to a winter coat. A built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your purse, car or locker.

The VESP Eco Flame is made from water resistant 100% Eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester with the most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

name: VESP Eco Cotton Candy
description:
The chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of the most reflective 3M Scotchlite material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A versatile roomy cut fits over anything from a bandeau top to a winter coat. And a built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker.

The VESP Eco Cotton Candy is made from water resistant 100% Eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester with most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

name: VESP Eco Lime
description:
This chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of reflective material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A longer versatile roomy cut fits over anything from a bandeau top to a winter coat. A built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker plus the new mesh side pocket is perfect for your phone, keys, cash, etc...

The VESP Eco Lime is made from water resistant 100% Eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester with the most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

description:

And a built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker.

The VESP Eco Citron is made from water resistant 100% Eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester with most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

name: VESP Silver
description:
The chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of reflective material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A versatile roomy cut fits over anything from a bandeau top to a winter coat. And a built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker.


The VESP Silver is a gorgeous Silver Lamé fabric made in France with the most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

name: VESPERT Sequins
description:
We just received a new batch of these beauties.

The VESPERT Sequins features a silver charmeuse lining on the inside and a Hologram silver sequins outside that sparkles 24/7. Its loose, flattering fit and bold geometric shapes snap easily over a favorite T-shirt or a winter coat. The most reflective 3M Scotchlite™ material on the straps and signature V-neck keep it bright when the sun goes down.  

They won’t know what hit them.

name: ISOAR OYSTER Reversible Eco Citron
description:
Pretty as a pearl in a Linen/Cotton blend with a water resistant opalescent finish on the outside and water resistant eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester in eye popping eco citron on the inside, the Reversible Isoar Oyster also features two zippered pockets to hold all your Vesper gear, a reflective waistband and signature V neck. 

MADE IN NYC

name: ISOAR WINGS
description:
The elegant ISOAR WINGS features a cascade of bi-colored silver charmeuse silk and citron recycled poly ruffles with reflective piping on the back. The pearled oyster bodice, signature plunging V-neck and bomber style elastic waistband in highly reflective 3M material plus two zippered pockets to hold your Vesper essentials make the fully lined ISOAR WINGS a sensational choice for flying down (and tearing up) the road.
In other words, you’ll pop their eyes out!

name: ROAD HOG OYSTER
description:
We are so excited to finally have these in stock!
The sleek Road Hog, Oyster is the most discreet of high viz vests. It features a self of Linen/Cotton with a water-resistant mother-of-pearl sheen, bold 3M Scotchlite waist band and detailing, a silk lining, two side zip pockets and an inner cell phone pocket.
To celebrate their arrival, we are offering FREE SHIPPING on the ROAD HOGS. 
It’s not the journey or the destination, it’s what you wear along the way.

MADE IN NYC

name: RACING JACKET Reversible Oyster/Camel
description:
The REVERSIBLE RACING JACKET is two fabulous jackets in one.

The Oyster side is a Linen/Cotton blend with a PU water-resistant coating that gives a mother-of-pearl sheen and bold 3M Scotchlite™ waist band, cuffs and 3 racing stripes up the back. This side also has two zippered pockets on the sides. The Reverse side, while not serving as a cozy lining, is a gorgeous camel-colored 100% wool with an Oyster lapel. 3M Scotchlite™ lights up the cuffs and waist band. 

To celebrate their arrival, we are offering FREE SHIPPING on the RACING JACKETS.

Go Boldly into the Dark Night.

MADE IN NYC

name: RED HOOK RIDING DRESS
description:
The Red Hook Riding Dress, a limited-edition collaboration between Vespertine and The Red Hook Criterium, features 3M Scotchlite reflective buttons on the collar and cuffs, placket over front buttons, a flattering tailored bodice, two deep side pockets and a just-the-right-length circle skirt with silver lining. In blazing Red Hook Red wrinkle-resistant poly-cotton blend fabric and Made in NYC's Garment District.
(Gossamer Belt sold separately.)

Sizing guide
XS = waist 26 inches, USA 0-2, Euro 36-38
S = waist 28 inches, USA 4, Euro 40
M = waist 30 inches, USA 6, Euro 42
L = waist 32 inches, USA 8, Euro 44

name: RIDING DRESS, Cinnabar Flash
description:
Our classic RIDING DRESS in a show stopping Cinnabar Flash, is made from a lightweight wicking poly that has 3M Scotchlite™ Reflective thread woven into a discreet check pattern. The dress also features 3M Scotchlite reflective buttons on the collar and cuffs, a placket over front buttons, flattering tailored bodice, two deep side pockets and a just-the-right-length circle skirt. Proudly made in NYC's Garment District.  Also available in Black Flash.

We are waiting for more of this awe-inspiring fabric to arrive and are currently taking pre-orders, estimated delivery is December 2013. Please place your order to reserve yours now!

Sizing guide

S = waist 28 inches, USA 2/4
M = waist 30.5 inches, USA 6/8
L = waist 33 inches, USA 10/12

name: RIDING DRESS, Black Flash
description:
Our classic RIDING DRESS, Black Flash is your new favorite black dress. It is made from a light-weight wicking poly that has 3M Scotchlite™ Reflective thread woven into a discreet check pattern. The dress also features 3M Scotchlite reflective buttons on the collar and cuffs, a placket over front buttons, flattering tailored bodice, two deep side pockets and a just-the-right-length circle skirt. Proudly made in NYC's Garment District. 
Also available in Cinnabar Flash.

We are waiting for more of this awe-inspiring fabric to arrive and are currently taking pre-orders, estimated delivery is beginning December 2013. Please contact us for more details and to reserve yours!

Sizing guide

S = waist 28 inches, US 2/4
M = waist 30.5, inches, US 6/8
L = waist 33, inches US 10/12

name: ROAD HOG TWEED Reversible Cotton Candy
description:
The exquisite Road Hog Reversible Tweed features High-tech 3M reflective thread woven seamlessly into a soft, light-weight merino wool Scottish Heritage Tweed. Woven in the old Scottish Traditional manner- The reflective stripes lie largely dormant but awake to astonishing effect in direct light- such as a car's head lights or the paparrazi's flash. We call it a Flash Tweed.
The flip side is a water resistant ECO CIRCLE™ 100% recycled (and recyclable) polyester made in a closed loop system and in scintillating Cotton Candy with grey Scottish Heritage Tweed detailing. 

It’s not the journey or the destination, it’s what you wear along the way.

HAND MADE IN NYC

name: ROAD HOG Eco Citron
description:
What's softer than a cloud and keeps you deliciously warm? 
The ROAD HOG, Eco Citron! 
Claim your right to the road fabulously in this exquisitely tailored, fully lined bodice of water-resistant eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester adorned with fluo-citron Meribou feathers, lightweight highly reflective 3M stripes and a reflective waist band plus an inner zippered cell phone pocket. 
You will stop traffic!

MADE IN NYC

name: ROAD HOG Eco White Flash
description:
What's softer than a cloud and keeps you deliciously warm? 
The ROAD HOG, Eco White Flash! 
Claim your right to the road fabulously in this exquisitely tailored, fully lined bodice of water-resistant eco-circle recycled/recyclable polyester adorned with brilliant white ostrich feathers, light weight highly reflective 3M stripes and a reflective waist band plus an inner zippered cell phone pocket. 
You will stop traffic!

MADE IN NYC

name: TRENCH Oyster
description:
The impeccably tailored Trench Coat is made from a Linen/Cotton-Blend with a water-resistant mother-of-pearl coating and has a zip-out full lining of merino wool in a soft camel color that makes it a best friend for all seasons. Exquisitely detailed with 3M Scotchlite™ covered buttons, buckles and reflective piping, to highlight your curves. Two discreet zippered side pockets keep your Vesper gear safe and close. It's a stunner. 

HAND MADE IN NYC. 

PLEASE NOTE: We are taking pre-orders on the next production run of the TRENCH Oyster. Email info@vespertinenyc.com for more info and to reserve your size.

name: SASH-AY SCARF Flash Tweed, Grey
description:
The unisex SASH-AY SCARF is for those who take design seriously and high visibility discreetly.  High-tech 3M reflective thread is woven seamlessly into this soft, light-weight merino wool Heritage Flash Tweed hand-woven in the traditional manner in Scotland. The reflective stripes lie largely dormant then awake to astonishing effect in direct light- be it Headlights or the Paparrazi's Flash.  The 3M Scotchlite Reflective Button means your can secure it either around your neck or across your body (as a sash) on your next sashay.  

Fellow travelers will take notice. 

MADE IN NYC

name: SASH-AY SCARF Flash Tweed, Yellow
description:
The unisex SASH-AY SCARF is for those who take design seriously and high visibility discreetly.  High-tech 3M reflective thread is woven seamlessly into this soft, light-weight merino wool Heritage Flash Tweed hand-woven in the traditional manner in Scotland. The reflective stripes lie largely dormant then awake to astonishing effect in direct light- be it Headlights or the Paparrazi's Flash.  The 3M Scotchlite Reflective Button means your can secure it either around your neck or across your body (as a sash) on your next sashay.  

Fellow travelers will take notice. 

MADE IN NYC

name: BOW TIE Scottish Heritage Flash Tweed
description:
High-tech 3M reflective thread is woven seamlessly into this soft, light-weight merino wool Heritage Tweed from Scotland. The reflective stripes lie largely dormant but awake to astonishing effect in the direct light of a car's head lights or the paparrazzi's flash.
Hand-made in NYC, the Bow Tie clips on for easy elegance and flare.

Available in Brown, Grey, Yellow, Red, Navy
MADE IN NYC

name: LADIES BOW Scottish Heritage Flash Tweed
description:
High-tech 3M reflective thread is woven seamlessly into this soft, light-weight merino wool Heritage Tweed from Scotland. The reflective stripes lie largely dormant but awake to astonishing effect in direct light- such as that produced by a car's head lights or the paparrazzi's flash.
This adorable bow is hand-made in the NYC's garment district and has an adjustable neck-band to adorn all sizes.

MADE IN NYC

name: SKIPPER BELT Quick Silver
description:
Capitans and Capitanas, this unisex belt is made entirely of highly reflective 3M Scotchlite™ material. It sports a solid Italian-made metal buckle, a 1.5” belt with black backing, and seven holes with grommets. Loop it through your favorite jeans or around an over-coat, and steer your ship safely through the night. 

MADE IN NYC

Note: There 10 holes that span the following range:

Size Chart: 

30" = 28" - 34" (71 - 86 cm)
32" = 30" - 36" (76 - 91 cm)
34" = 32" - 38" (81 - 96 cm)
36" = 34" - 40" (86 - 101 cm)
38" = 36" - 42" (91 - 106 cm)
40" = 38" - 44" (96 - 112 cm)
42" = 40" - 46" (101 - 117 cm)

name: GOSSAMER BELT Quick Silver
description:
Sweet as a Gossamer's wing, this feminine belt of highly reflective 3M Scotchlite™ silver material has a square, prong-less covered buckle, a 1.15” wide belt with black backing, and is made by hand in NYC.  Easily adjustable, it can be worn around the hips or waist and makes stylish safety a cinch. Wrap it around your favorite dress, sweater, or trench and go lightly.

Note: This highly adjustable belt has no holes in it. The sizes listed are the largest girth that can be comfortably accommodated by each size.

MADE IN NYC

Size Chart:

XS - 30.5" (77cm) - Maximum length
S. - 33.5" (85 cm) - Maximum length
M - 36.5" (92cm) - Maximum length
L - 39.5" (100cm) - Maximum length
XL - 42.5" (108cm) - Maximum length

name: SKINNY BELT Quick Silver
description:
The latest in our reflective belt collection! This super skinny highly reflective belt is made from ANSI approved 3M Scotchlite™ material. It's a sleek 0.5" wide with a nickle buckle, 7 nickle grommets, black backing. Available in Quick Silver-  made by hand in NYC.  

Note: There 7 holes that span the following range:

Size Chart: 

XS - 24" - 29" (61 - 74 cm) 
S - 25" - 31" (63 - 39 cm)
M - 29" - 34" (74 - 86 cm)
L - 32" - 38" (81 - 96 cm)
XL - 35" - 41" (89 - 104 cm)

name: CINCH BELT Blue Max
description:
A subtle pattern of intertwining diamonds wraps around the extremely reflective ANSI approved material of the Cinch Belts. They even reflect in the rain! Other features include a metal buckle,  a 2" wide belt, and five holes with grommets. Made in NYC, the Cinch is spectacular in White Flash, Citron, or Blue Max. Belt one, two, or all three over a dress, sweater, parka, or trench and set your waist aglow.

Note: There 7 holes that span the following range:

Size Chart:

S - 26" - 32" (66 - 81 cm)
M - 31" - 37" (74 - 86 cm)
L - 36" - 42" (91 - 107 cm)

description:

name: LAUREL BRACELET
description: Laurel is a source of peace and protection, and so it is with this LAUREL wreath Bracelet- wear it to light up your wrist, your hand signals, or even your handle bars. A snap closure keeps it secure where ever you wrap it. Like all of our items, it is hand made in NYC with 3M Scotchlite™ material.

name: LAUREL ANKLET/ TROUSER STRAP
description: Bound to be a source of peace and protection, this LAUREL ANKLET/TROUSER STRAP lights up your ankle and keeps your pants away from your bike chains. You'll shine while you pedal and your pants will stay clean. A snap closure keeps it secure where ever you wrap it. Like all of our items, it is hand made in NYC with 3M Scotchlite™ material.

name: BLOSSOM BOUTONNIERE, Quick Silver
description:
"Boutonnière" comes from the word "buttonhole" in French. Once a men's staple accessory- Boutonnières are back- and ours is sure to set you apart from the crowd. The Quicksilver color of the 3M® Scotchlite™ Reflective material complements any suit jacket and when street light or paparrazi's flash find you Vespertine's BLOSSOM BOUTONNIERE will make you really shine. So button up, on your way to work or at your next swanky affair! 
For the boutonnière to fit properly on your suit jacket, the buttonhole should ideally be at least 1⅛ cm long.  The boutonnière itself is approximately 1''x1.5'' (2.54cm x 3.81 cm). 

MADE IN NYC

name: LAUREL CLIP/PIN GOLD
description:
A symbol of peace and protection, the LAUREL clip/pin to bags, jackets, helmets or to your hair and watch your friends and on-coming traffic be amazed at how it glows in the evening sun (a.k.a. Flashes and Headlights). 

Hand Made in NYC entirely from 3M Scotchlite™ material with both a pin and a clip fixture on the back side.

name: LAUREL CLIP/PIN Quicksilver
description:

name: OAK EARRINGS, Gold
description:
These sweet, ultra-lightweight reflective leaf earrings are a must have for fall.

Hand Made in NYC from 3M Scotchlite™ material.

name: OAK EARRINGS, Silver
description:
These sweet, ultra-lightweight reflective leaf earrings are a must have for fall.

Hand Made in NYC from 3M Scotchlite™ material.

name: BUTTON EARRINGS, Quick Silver
description: Cute as a button reflectors that are sized just for your lobe. These subtle silver discs of 3M Scotchlite™ shine bright like diamonds in direct light and are hand made in NYC.

name: BLOSSOM CLIP/PIN Quicksilver, Grande
description:
Attach this beautiful Vespertine Flower clip & pin to bags, jackets or headbands and amaze your friends and on-coming traffic when it glows in the evening sun (a.k.a. Flashes and Headlights). 
Hand Made in NYC entirely from 3M Scotchlite™ material. 
4.5" diameter

name: BLOSSOM CLIP/PIN Quicksilver, Petite
description:
Attach this beautiful 3-dimensional Vespertine BLOSSOM clip/pin to bags, jackets, helmets or to your hair and watch your friends and on-coming traffic be amazed at how it glows in the evening sun (a.k.a. Flashes and Headlights). 
Hand Made in NYC entirely from 3M Scotchlite™ material with both a pin and a clip fixture on the back side. 2.5" diameter

The BLOSSOM PIN Petite is shown in Cream & Gold. 

Custom wholesale orders are available in Gun Metal, Forest Green, Gold, and Cream. Please contact us for details.

description:
The chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of reflective material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A versatile roomy cut fits over anything from a bandeau top to a winter coat. And a built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker.

The VESP Beaded Citron Chiffon is a semi-transparent beaded chiffon fabric with the most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

MADE IN NYC

name: VESP Copper
description:
INTRODUCING THE VESP!

This chic, light weight VESP is perfect for an early morning jog, a dusky walk, evening cocktails, a late night bike ride and everything in between. Bright colors and 360º of reflective material provide excellent day and night time visibility. A versatile roomy cut fits over anything from a bandeau top to a winter coat. And a built-in stuff pocket means it stores breezily in your bag, car or locker.

MADE IN NYC
The VESP Copper is a gorgeous Copper Lamé fabric made in France with the most reflective 3M Scotchlite Material on the crossing straps, signature V-neck, around the bottom edge and the adjustable tie closure.

name: VESPERT    Eco Flame
description:
The loose, flattering fit and bold geometric shapes of the VESPERTS make them a classic that snap as easily over a favorite T as a winter coat. The crossed 3M reflective straps in the back and signature V-neck keep it bright when the sun goes down. The VESPERT ECO is made from flame colored water-resistant 100% recycled polyester. They won't know what hit them.

MADE IN NYC

name: POCKET TAILS Eco Cotton Candy
description:
The POCKET TAILS is constructed with water-resistant Eco Circle® 100% recycled/recyclable polyester with a metal YKK zipper and lightweight highly reflective 3M stripes and piping. 
The whole vest stuffs handily into it’s own back pocket/pouch for easy storage in your purse or basket. 
A perfect choice for eco-minded  Vespers on the go!

name: VESPERT Quick Silver
description:
The loose, flattering fit and bold geometric shapes of the VESPERTS make them a classic that snap as easily over a favorite Tee as a winter coat. The crossed 3M reflective straps in the back and signature V-neck keep it bright when the sun goes down. 

This lightweight VESPERT, QUICK SILVER is in dazzling French Lameé fabric.

MADE IN NYC
